actions.committee: House Committee on Ways and Means
actions.text: Referred to House Committee on Ways and Means.

official_title: A bill to amend title XVI of the Social Security Act to provide that supplemental security income benefits may be paid thereunder to any individual who is outside the United States for the sole purpose of obtaining medical or remedial treatment.

summary.text: Provides that supplemental security income benefits may be paid under the Social Security Act to any individual who is outside the United States for the sole purpose of obtaining medical or remedial treatment.

titles.title: A bill to amend title XVI of the Social Security Act to provide that supplemental security income benefits may be paid thereunder to any individual who is outside the United States for the sole purpose of obtaining medical or remedial treatment.
